title: Nmoder Casual Dresses for Women Semi Formal Fit and Flare Dresses 3/4 Sleeve A-line Church Work Dresses with Pockets
description: 【COMFORTABLE MATERIALS】 Made of 92% polyester and 8% spandex. The church dresses for women is designed to provide a sense of fitted, airy comfort. High quality stretchy fabric with a nice drapey effect, not easy to wrinkle.

【ELEGANT AND STYLISH DESIGN】 This vintage fit and flare cocktail dress for women features with v-neck, 3/4 sleeve, midi length and high waist design, enhancing your figure and instilling confidence and allure.

【FIT AND FLARE DRESS】This is an elegant and classic dress can hide belly fat and optimizes waistline and body proportion, adding a touch of glamour and comfort elements. Pockets on both sides for carry your small things.

【FOR ANY OCCASIONS】The midi dresses for women is a versatile addition to your wardrobe, suitable for various occasions such as wedding guest, cocktail party, funeral, church, wear to work, and semi-formal or casual occasions.The women dresses can be dressed up with high heels or dressed down with pumps.
【You Need To Know】The womens work dresses need to wash in cold water and do not bleach or soak for a long time.
